nodes.text: Cassandran brandy was a type of exquisite liquor produced by the inhabitants of the Cassandran sectors. Unlike most brandies, it was actually worth the arcane procedures indulged in by dedicated brandy enthusiasts; however, the average drinker was unlikely to find it to be better than the Cassandran's other major alcoholic beverage, Cassandran choholl. Senator Simon Greyshade enjoyed Cassandran brandy, and Master-Com offered the drink to the high-rollers he entertained on The Wheel.
